QuestData.Title: Overthrone
QuestData.Description: The council is in harmony, wakener.$b$bOur ritual will bring about the demise of the empress and allow us to secure the future of our great empire.$b$bBehold the power of the Klaxxi!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Klaxxi'va Vor in Klaxxi'vess.
QuestData.RewardText: We are... undone, wakener.$b$bYour efforts appear to have become imperative to our cause.$b$bOn behalf of the remaining council, I implore you to continue in your assistance.
